headline: Lam Research Corporation Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Lam Research Corporation (Nasdaq: LRCX) today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a quarterly dividend of $0.26 per share of common stock. The dividend payment will be made on April 8, 2026, to holders of record on March 4, 2026. Future dividend payments are subject to review and approval by the Board of Directors.

headline: Flex's Q3 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: FLEX tops Q3 FY26 earnings and revenue estimates on strong AI-driven demand and raised full-year guidance, yet shares slid as investor concerns resurfaced.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Believe Lam Research (LRCX) Could Rally 30.51%: Here's is How to Trade
summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 30.5% in Lam Research (LRCX). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.

summary: Lam Research (LRCX) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.

headline: Lam Research Leadership And CEA Leti Alliance Target AI Equipment Edge
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) has appointed Sesha Varadarajan as chief operating officer. The company has added Anirudh Devgan to its board of directors. Lam has entered a multi year specialty technology alliance with CEA Leti focused on AI and high performance computing. Lam Research, a major supplier of wafer fabrication equipment and services to chipmakers, is making leadership and partnership moves as demand for semiconductors tied to AI and high performance computing draws investor...
